kubectl config
=======
 kubectl配置

config文件内容:

```
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: 
    server: https://10.0.1.30:60002
  name: local
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: local
    user: admin
  name: master
current-context: master
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: admin
  user:
    token: Lfkk8BlgoXmu7D4IkjpzMDl9X4dPR1Sz
```

kubectl使用
